idea-plugin.name: Apply Diff from Clipboard
idea-plugin.description: Applies clipboard diff patches directly to your open file. Includes context-based hunk alignment, safe write, and visual feedback.
idea-plugin.change-notes: v0.3.0 — Stable Client Build • Context-based alignment (±50 lines) • Visual highlight feedback using markup model • Safe insert/delete/replace logic • Error reporting moved outside write action

action.description: Applies a clipboard diff patch to the current file.
